website_summaries.verdict: While it's not best choice for activities like whitewater rafting, it's a sturdy model that is also easy to handle and offers some nice features. Keep in mind that if you hope to fit 6 people, it may disappoint you.
pros: Stands up to use in most lakes thanks to its thick PVC vinyl construction
Has fishing rod and cup holders that make it a handy option for fishing excursions
cons: Though rated to hold 6 people, it may be a tight fit
Not ideal for use in rough water

customer_reviews.title: I fit comfortably with my two teen girls
customer_reviews.text: Lost a star because it def does not fit 6 adults. I fit comfortably with my two teen girls. easy to inflate although i would like to see a tire thing on it so i can fill with a good compressor...i used the compressor that came with my mattress and it worked fine. filled fast. deflated fast as well. Went out twice on the lake with it and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T

customer_reviews.title: good boat, but small
customer_reviews.text: bought it at amazon on prime day. i inflated it at home. everything is ok, but inflation gauge is not working. i could live without it. it is definitely small. internal dimension is 27 inch by 7 feet, which is a joke to hold 6 people. i would say 2 adults and 2 kids are at max. feel it is sturdy. soft bottom makes me nervous, but i used a soft-bottomed Intex which holds up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: John CA

customer_reviews.title: Not quite the "fish hunter"
customer_reviews.text: We from the fish hunter to this model, as it's a bit cheaper. The only real difference is the two extra air chambers under the sides of the fish hunter. It turns out, they make a pretty big difference with respect to both rigidity and handling of the raft. Fours stars for the competitive price and good value, but honestly, will probably pay a little more for the fish hunter next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldus Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Great boat for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great boat for fishing, just make sure you have a pump that is strong enough to inflate the boat appropriately. i made the mistake of buying a pump that was not strong enough and could never get the boat well inflated. Also be careful with the plugs on the air valves the open very easily and the boat looses air while in the middle of the water, and the air escapes. Once the boat is not appropriately inflated it is very uncomfortable on the water. What I did is buy duct tape to secure the air plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Max Andres Contag

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I'm happy with it. So far its been durable and serves its purpose there are one or two design flaws. When you sit on the back to control the trolling motor the rod holder tilts the poles towards each other. Its not quite as stable as I hoped even with a sheet of plywood in the bottom. I compared reviews and so far I feel confident I made the right pick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wildfire backup evacuation plan
customer_reviews.text: This is my backup wildfire evacuation plan. You're supposed to have more than one plan. So if my car doesn't work for some reason or the roads are blocked or something I've got plan B. No reason at all anyone should burn up when there is a lake right here.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: It will not feet 2 adults at the same time comfortably. However
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other people who purchased this boat, it is definitely too small for description. It will not feet 2 adults at the same time comfortably. However, it does what its intended to do very well. It inflates great, functions and performs just as it should. Absolutely no issues with functions so far. Would have been nice to have 2 seat cushions. and a little more room to be able to get 2 adults inside comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Shniper

customer_reviews.title: Nice boat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice boat for the price. So far made about 8 fishing trips. It is holding up good. However, the seats are not comfortable and oars could use improvement. I wish the oars were longer and had better stopping mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Alexei Boldyshev

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this rubber (vinyl) boat. Tough, well made, thoughtful design, apparently robust, weather and sunlight resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hampt

customer_reviews.title: Non returnable. Dont buy this pos
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this. Its non returnable. Got mine. Inflated and it wont hold air. Out 300.00.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great durability
customer_reviews.text: I liked how rugged n adaple it is for fishing. . small. And portable too. Can inflate and deflate all in same day. Has. Alot of room too.
customer_reviews.author: thomas byczek

customer_reviews.title: The product was not complete and the delivery condition was horrible.
customer_reviews.text: The box was terribly broken, it is possible that this item might have been opened & returned. There was not instructions manual and parts were missing. I am still waiting for a response on the parts missing. I am not a very happy consumer. See photo. Oar holders were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Liked It
customer_reviews.text: We were finally able to use this and it performed as expected. Two adults and 4 children, ages 2-8, fit comfortably for the river float.
customer_reviews.author: Randa

customer_reviews.title: Good boat. Do not like the placement of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good boat. Do not like the placement of the grab handles; when you have a trolling motor mounted or the transom mount on it is impossible to grab a hold of the rear handle.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's big and durable, but hard to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for rivers and lakes... Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is not big enough for 6 adults or really 4 adults but it's good enough for 2 adults and 2 kids. It's very sturdy and I put it on the water the day that I got it and had an amazing time. Friends said get a kayak or canoe but I got this and love it. Ordering the motor mount and a motor next.
customer_reviews.author: S.Otey

customer_reviews.title: Hard enough for lake,
customer_reviews.text: I am using it with a 3o lb minkota electric trolley custom made . Great pvc gauge . 3 air chambere enough security and stability. Include an hard floor and by the price you have a great inflatable.
customer_reviews.author: deltaestrella

customer_reviews.title: It should state one person not 3 (Dangerous)!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but it should be only for one person
customer_reviews.author: mitzy24k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boat. Fits two people comfortably, with two small dogs in the middle. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boat - sturdy, easy to handle, fun on flat water. Not recommended for whitewater, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: smaller than I thought and it's really best for two people
customer_reviews.text: smaller than I thought and it's really best for two people. It lost some air over time. but it's been a pretty good raft for the times we use it.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a great quality raft this is the one. Holds up great. Super sturdy and awesome quality. We've been very happy with it !
customer_reviews.author: kim c.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome raft, 4 fishing rod holders, 4 cup holders. Heavy duty, fits 4 best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good but boat is too narrow and too small
customer_reviews.text: This is "NOT" a 4 person boat. 2 adults and that's it. Quality is good but boat is too narrow and too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise great raft.
customer_reviews.text: River current took us into a thorn tree. The raft survive being pushed up against it while we pushed off with our oars. Little small on the inside, but otherwise great raft.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good raft but to get 6-8 people, at most, only 3 can be adults.
customer_reviews.text: Holds 4 adults at most. Our previous Seahawks raft had more room.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: The only issue is it's a four person boat. NOWAY can six adults fit in this boat. Otherwise it is very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: kari basting

customer_reviews.title: Great boat! It's a lot of fun and does ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boat! It's a lot of fun and does to job for angler's of any age. If you are going to use it for fishing, it fits 2 grown adults + 2 children very comfortably with enough room for tackle and cooler. Without tackle and cooler, me and my 5 kids fit just fine to go for a ride.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Steven Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Built good. I like the three different compartments, if one goes out it will still float
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wright

customer_reviews.title: I actually purchased it because it was made of strong material so I could have our lab join us in our adventures and it works ex
customer_reviews.text: Boat actually should be rated as a 4 person raft. However, I actually purchased it because it was made of strong material so I could have our lab join us in our adventures and it works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Augusta McGowan-Hass

customer_reviews.title: Amazon selling Defective Airhead Angler Bay boats not willing to back it up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boat last year but never took it out of the box until I bought a motor mount for it, Problem is the motor mount mounting grommets [brackets] were Never installed on this boat, only black patches where the mounts to secure the rods should be glued to the boat. Now I have no way to secure the trolling motor to the boat to be able to use it?! I tried writing Amazon CS but not willing to help me with this; it's Not the 1st time I have had negative problems with Amazon's customer service...
customer_reviews.author: IraC18

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This boat is amazing & can handle a ton of weight!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good raft for one adult plus gear. Small for two adults. One seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Martin B Husung

customer_reviews.title: Raft has small cuts all over it. Not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Raft has small cuts all over it. Not sure how sea-worthy it will be. Also note, this raft is very long and the oar locks require extra long oars if you are not tall. I'm 5'5"
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Great raft
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a raft to fit two adults plus a small cooler and fishing gear this is the raft to get. Two inflatable seats two storage pouches. One attached and the other a battery pouch or gear pouch that's removable. Oar locks are great. Cup holders are placed just right for two people. Inflation gauge works great. Monitors the #2 air chamber. Oars holders are useless. Inflates in about ten minutes with airhead 12v pump or 15 minutes with the airhead double action hand pump. Best raft for the money. Best raft for two adults and gear.
customer_reviews.author: Martin B Husung

customer_reviews.title: This is a real good product! even though it is not big enough ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a real good product! even though it is not big enough for 6 people, but there's still room for 3 adults. It doesn't come with any paddles or air pump, so make sure you get it before heading out. the product is around 40 lbs
customer_reviews.author: samzhang

customer_reviews.title: So Good I'm compelled to do my first ever product review on amazon
customer_reviews.text: WOW...what a great inflatable boat. I was torn between this boat and intex excursion 5. So happy I went with the Angler Bay. It my not have the room the Excursion does but this is one tough and durable boat. First time out we loaded it with 4 full size adults..emphasize on full size...and a 84 pound black lab who wouldn't sit still. No problems at all. Oar holders aren't that great but I have a minn kota on the way and shouldn't be an issue. If you're thinking about an inflatable, the Angler Bay wont disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: The boat itself is awesome! Very stable and great to fish from
customer_reviews.text: The Sportsman's Guide, where the boat came from, was very helpful. They also responded very quickly to my inquiries. The boat itself is awesome! Very stable and great to fish from. We put an electric motor on it using a motor mount kit for this boat and fished all day. I would recommend this boat for small lakes. Very well constructed as well. Great boat and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nimera

customer_reviews.title: best buy for money
customer_reviews.text: Good raft for the money, not super heavy duty but good enough and only fits 4 people. Comes with 2 inflatable seats also. Lost some air over 6 hours but the valves allow you to inflate while not letting air escape which is awesome to top off when air does get out.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Fun times
customer_reviews.text: Great boat for getting out in the water even if it's a little windy. 3 fits comfortably. 2 necessary for a fun water time. Highly recommend. Fast shipping (Prime member).
customer_reviews.author: ALshopper1

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable boat
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to take the family around lakes and slow moving waters. I used a foot pump to inflate it and took me less than 10 minutes, it is easy to carry, though you will need two people if inflated. The boat will not accommodate 6 adults, it is a bit narrow, you could fit 4 adults plus some fishing gear and a cooler comfortably. The boat trails OK but you may need two people rowing to haul all the weight. This boat is a fun and I am anxious to try it with our trolling motor. Overall a great boat.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: its just like the old hf 360 with a couple add-ons
customer_reviews.text: if you had the old hf 360 fish hunter and are looking for a new boat. get this one. its just like the old hf 360 with a couple add-ons. great boat.
customer_reviews.author: Matt JC

customer_reviews.title: really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his camping trips with this boat! really easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Beck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and 4 cup holders. Not too heavy either. Shipped FAST!!! Yes, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenerator

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING EXERCISE.
customer_reviews.text: GRRRRRREAT FOR THE ARMS/BACK/LEGS WHEN ROWING. MATERIAL DURABLE/TOUGH. ALOT OF FUTURE W/ FISHING AND JUST HAVING A TIME ON THE WATER.
customer_reviews.author: REV. KENN STONE

customer_reviews.title: Umm---Good... but could improve...
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far... but... 1. Way too small for even 4 people, 3 is comfortable... 2. Does not come with a user instruction guide. I wonder what the black valves are for on the floor of the boat. 3. Cant tell if there is the right amount of air filled in the 3 chambers. Would have appreciated a gauge. 4. Would have also appreciated a set of oars and a pump to inflate (I had to but it separately) 3. Material seems to be thick, which is good. But only time will tell how the boat really performs. I will sure to come back and post my comments after my first use...
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: trolling motor transom mounts are not included
customer_reviews.text: Hi, The boat looks fine, I did not use it yet, but a warning: despite what the Amazon description says, trolling motor transom mounts are _not_included.
customer_reviews.author: Slawek

product_meta.title: AIRHEAD Angler Bay Inflatable Boat
feature_bullets: Includes an inflatable floor and a movable seat
Constructed of heavy duty vinyl with electronically welded seams
Equipped with wrap around grab lines
There are 2 Rod Holders and multiple molded drink holders

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
